name: Space Cliker
description: SPACE CLICKER. when the earth is under attack by pirate , humanity last hope is to make a space ship and flew it across the galaxy, cause we are human and we dont care about earth like we are in the last 50 years (jk). but after the launch the enemy intercepted you and you have to fend yourself with seemingly infinite resources cause this is a game.as you have 0 seconds crafting , while spamming your keyboard and keep clicking. Space clicker
